name: StopWatch (LD38)
description:
A turn-based combat game where your enemies move for as long as you did.

Made in 72 hours for LD 38.

I'll get to web as soon as I can.

Controls-----

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Space to do the thing.

Gamepad uses X for PS and A for Xbox.

R to restart.

Credits-----

Clockwise2000- Sound stuff and music.

SkullPixel- Art and coding.

SkullPixel's Mom- Schoolwork.

Some other people- Misc ideas, encouragement, and procrastination.
